title.rendered: ADR Chambers now offers online video mediations and arbitrations

content.rendered: Video conference mediations allow participants to log into the ADR Chambers platform from anywhere in the world. Everyone can see and hear each other online, have private caucuses in virtual private rooms, review and edit documents, and collaborate on a settlement agreement. During video conference arbitrations, parties can present witnesses. There can be up to 32 parties from different locations.
